subject: Mathematics
question_text: From all the English alphabets, five letters are chosen and are arranged in alphabetical order. The total number of ways, in which the middle letter is ' M ', is : 2025 (22 Jan Shift 1) JEE Main 2025 January JEE Main Previous Year Paper MathonGo a 1 , a 2 , a 3 , … a 1 a 5 = 28 a 2 + a 4 = 29 a 6 628 812 526 784 x = x(y) y 2 1 y )dy = 0 x(1) = 1 x ( 1 2 ) 1 2 + e 3 + e 3 −e 3 2 + e m n gcd(m, n) = 1 m + n 4 14 13 11 e 5(log e x) 2 +3 = x 8 , x > 0 e 8/5 e 6/5 e 2 (1, 3), (3, 1) (2, 4) x + 2y = 2 △PQR (α, β) 15(α −β) 19 24 21 22 f(x) = 7 tan 8 x + 7 tan 6 x −3 tan 4 x −3 tan 2 x, I 1 = ∫ π/4 0 f(x)dx I 2 = ∫ π/4 0 xf(x)dx 7I 1 + 12I 2 2 1 2π π y = x 2 + px −3 P, Q (−1, −1) P, Q R △PQR 7 4 6 5 L 1 : x−1 2 = y−2 3 = z−3 4 L 2 : x−2 3 = y−4 4 = z−5 5 L 1 L 2 ( 14 3 , −3, 22 3 ) (− 5 3 , −7, 1) (2, 3, 1 3 ) ( 8 3 , −1, 1 3 ) f(x) f(0) = 1 f(x + y) = f(x)f ′ (y) + f ′ (x)f(y) x, y ∈R ∑ 100 n=1 log e f(n) 2525 5220 2384 2406
